f18389.value: Rua Tomás da Fonseca in Lisbon

f18394.value: The Group develops its activities in the energy sector, namely electricity from renewable sources, exploration, production and commercialization of hydrocarbons (oil & natural gas), refining and distribution of lubricants, gas, gasoline, diesel, fuel oil, jet fuel, asphalts and others and the acquisition and wholesale distribution of natural gas.
